home.productionModeDesc: Please configure YouTube and AI API keys to enable full video search and intelligent analysis features. Once configured, you can search real YouTube videos!
home.browserModeDesc: Currently running in browser, please configure API keys to enable full features. Recommend using 'npm run dev' or 'cargo tauri dev' to run desktop app.
home.testModeDesc: Currently running in test mode with mock data.

search.inputPlaceholder: Enter keywords to search kids videos, e.g.: animals, math, stories...
search.resultsSubtitle: We've selected the most suitable video content for children
search.emptyDescription: Enter keywords in the search box above to find videos suitable for children

strict.prompt: Please analyze videos with the strictest standards to ensure content is completely suitable for 2-4 year olds. Requirements: 1. Absolutely no violence or scary elements 2. Simple and easy to understand language 3. Soft colors 4. Slow pace 5. Clear educational value 6. Duration 2-8 minutes. Scoring criteria are extremely strict, only videos scoring above 95 will pass.

balanced.prompt: Please analyze whether videos are suitable for 3-6 year old children. Criteria: 1. Educational value: helps with learning cognition, language, math, science, etc. 2. Content safety: no violence, horror, or inappropriate content 3. Age appropriate: matches preschool cognitive level 4. Suitable duration: recommended 2-20 minutes 5. Production quality: clear picture, clear audio, well-produced. Score each video 0-100, only return videos scoring above 70.

educational.prompt: Please prioritize videos with high educational value. Focus on: 1. Subject knowledge (math, science, language, arts) 2. Cognitive development 3. Creativity inspiration 4. Problem-solving skills 5. Critical thinking. Educational value weight 80%, entertainment weight 20%. Only return videos with education score above 85.

creative.prompt: Please filter videos that stimulate children's artistic creativity. Focus on: 1. Art forms like drawing, crafts, music, dance 2. Creative thinking development 3. Aesthetic ability improvement 4. Hands-on skills training 5. Imagination stimulation. Prioritize interactive content that children can follow along with.

nature.prompt: Please filter nature science enlightenment videos. Focus on: 1. Natural knowledge about animals, plants, weather, geography 2. Science experiments and observation 3. Environmental awareness cultivation 4. Curiosity stimulation 5. Exploration spirit development. Content should be factual and scientifically based.

language.prompt: Please filter videos that help develop language abilities. Focus on: 1. Vocabulary expansion 2. Pronunciation practice 3. Grammar structure 4. Reading comprehension 5. Expression ability. Include Chinese and English learning content, prioritize interactive videos with standard pronunciation.

balanced.name: Balanced Mode
balanced.description: For ages 3-6, balancing education and entertainment

video.deleteConfirmText: Are you sure you want to delete this video?

apiSteps.registerOrLogin: Register or login to your account
apiSteps.copyAndPaste: Copy the key and paste it into the input field above

settings.title: App Settings
settings.aiConfigDesc: Configure AI services to analyze and filter video content
settings.youtubeConfigDesc: Configure YouTube Data API for more accurate video information and better filtering
settings.filterConfigDesc: Set video filtering conditions and AI analysis parameters
settings.searchConfigDesc: Configure search preferences and video duration limits
settings.alarmConfigDesc: Configure viewing time reminders and alarm functions
settings.alarmMessagePlaceholder: e.g., Time to rest, little one!
settings.apiFasterThanScraping: API is Faster than Web Scraping
settings.howToGetYoutubeKey: How to Get YouTube API Key
settings.autoSaveNote: All settings will be automatically saved locally
settings.alarmFunctionDesc: Configure viewing time reminders to help control children's viewing time and develop good viewing habits.
settings.alarmTimeTooltip: After opening the video, the alarm will sound after the specified time
settings.confirmResetContent: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default values? This action cannot be undone.
settings.apiKeyRequired: API keys are essential for using intelligent filtering features. You need to configure at least one AI service provider's API key. All keys are securely stored locally and will not be uploaded to any server.
settings.getFromGoogle: Get from Google Cloud Console for better search experience
settings.durationTooltip: Videos longer than this duration will be filtered
settings.cacheDescription: Cache can improve search speed, but will take up local storage space. It is recommended to set an appropriate cache time based on usage frequency.
settings.customPromptPlaceholder: Example: Please pay special attention to the accuracy of scientific knowledge and prioritize videos with experimental demonstrations...
settings.customPromptHelp: Custom filter prompts are advanced features, recommended for experienced users. Incorrect prompts may affect filtering effectiveness.
